articles.title: Mid & small cap mutual funds: Regulators took these 4 steps to protect investors from high valuations | Mint - Mint
articles.description: SEBI and AMFI are taking steps to safeguard the interest of retail investors in mid and small-cap funds. These include asking AMCs to frame a policy to protect investor interests, disclosing risk parameters, moderating inflows, conducting stress tests, etc.
